rows.label: bf08290150_0010
rows.name:
Your Majesty!
Yesterday, we sealed Section 47.

rows.label: bf08290150_0020
rows.name:
I see... That was earlier 
than the Land Survey Institute predicted.

rows.label: bf08290150_0030
rows.name:
Recently, we've also observed rapid increases in 
geothermal activity around the imperial capital.

rows.label: bf08290150_0040
rows.name: So even here, our time is limited.

rows.label: bf08290150_0050
rows.name:
As the Divine Beast ages, its ether flow, which is like 
its blood gradually increases in temperature.

rows.label: bf08290150_0060
rows.name:
Perhaps we should advance our plans
to relocate the capital to Gula.

rows.label: bf08290150_0080
rows.name: We haven't properly explained this to the people of Gula yet.

rows.label: bf08290150_0090
rows.name: I'd rather not stir up needless opposition.

rows.label: bf08290150_0100
rows.name: We don't have much time remaining.

rows.label: bf08290150_0110
rows.name: And we're not the only ones facing this situation.

rows.label: bf08290150_0120
rows.name: Even Gula, with its renowned fertility,

rows.label: bf08290150_0130
rows.name: has experienced declining crop yields year by year.

rows.label: bf08290150_0140
rows.name: The entire world is screaming out in pain...

rows.label: bf08290150_0170
rows.name:
No...
It seems to be my imagination.

rows.label: bf08290150_0180
rows.name:
Dear [System:Ruby rt=Nee-san ]Cousin[/System:Ruby]...
Where are you now...
